<title level="1" right="Action">[Prove Peace](/Actions.aspx?ID=625) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 84</row>

**Requirements** You know the conflict that created a specific siege shard, and the siege shard is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24).

</column>

---

You touch the siege shard, establish a mental connection, and relay facts of the conflict's resolution. Attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about the conflict that created the shard, using the siege shard's Will DC. If you succeed, you prove the conflict's end, and the siege shard reverts to ordinary stone. On a critical failure, images of the past conflict overwhelm you, and you are [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) until the end of your next turn.
